DayOne: ^You cleaned the last few dirty glasses left from last night,
^You already tidied up the whole tavern as well as you could, and you can open up now.
^People should start to come in soon
^As you are drying the last glass you hear the door open, it's Charlie, he always comes to your place when he gets off work.
^You shrug your shoulders, as to say "like always".
^Charlie seems tired, his usual joyful personality and chattiness isn't coming out today.

Fine: ^You "Is everything ok? You look like you just escaped from a chasing
^Charlie "Oh yeah don't worry, just a bad day at work...
Drinking: ^You "Should I make you the usual drink?
Fine2: ^Charlie "Just give me the usual drink, please

GoodCharlie: ^Charlie sips his drink slowly, closing his eyes as he tastes it
BadCharlie: ^Charlie sips his drink slowly, but he stops as soon as he can taste it
^Charlie "Did you change some ingredients?... It's not that good... Anyway I'll drink it...

c-2: ^You "You wanna talk about your thoughts mr mysterious guy?

g-1: ^Charlie "It's nothing serious really, I just had a hard time delivering a package to the night club, I spent hours there... I swear Spike sometimes can be obnoxious...
^Charlie "and then my boss had something to say about it of course

Spike: ^You "What about Spike? He works as a bouncer there right?
^Charlie looks like he wants to talk now, a few sips of liquor and his good mood is right back.
^Charlie "Yah, sometimes he also does other jobs there, takes care of cleaning, takes care of tickets...
^Charlie "or sometimes he takes care of packages arriving
^Charlie "And today he really had something to say about it...
^Charlie "He complained for an hour about how the packages needed to be 6, not 5. What am I supposed to do about it? I just deliver
^Charlie "So then of course the boss got upset with the fact that I was losing time with that idiot.
^Charlie "Spike even snapped at me, I was scared he was about to punch me. Such a big fuss for a package.
^This story seems odd, you know Spike can be arrogant, but he doesn't really care about doing his job right...

c-1: ^You "Did he give up at some point?
^Charlie "Yes, I convinced him that I had nothing to do with it and he gave up, but he seemed really worried about it...

Deliver: ^Charlie "I have no idea, I'm not supposed to know the content of packages, I just kow it was real heavy
^Charlie "And that's odd, usually the packages for the night club are quite light, probably some cups or napkins...
Samantha: ^As Charlie is talking you see Samantha entering, as she is sitting at the counter she starts talking right away
^Samantha "You talking about Spike? That bully is going to get it from me sooner or later. Did he fight with Olivia again?
^Charlie "No, he just made my work day hell...
^Samantha "Poor bunny, delivery drivers always get the hate for stuff, I'm sorry

s: ^"Why would you want to fight with him?"

g-0: ^Samantha "He's always snapping at Olivia for the smallest stuff, he deserves a lesson for that. The poor girl is too nice to break up with him.
^Samantha "I don't even know why she got with him in the first place, he's an asshole...
^Charlie "By the way Sam, I got a delivery for your gym tomorrow, are you there at three?
^Samantha "Yeah, I'm there all day, I had a few problems lately...

s: ^"I see we're all having struggles at work

c-2: ^You "What kind of problems are you having?"
c-3: ^You "I see we're all having struggles at work... nice
^Charlie and Samantha nod and sigh in agreement

ProblemsSam: ^Samantha "Two of my employees just decided to quit without notice, they basically disappeared...
^Charlie "Maybe you scared them off with your attitude
^Samantha gives a harsh trheatening look to Charlie
^Charlie "I'm joking I'm joking, actually this town has been quite weird lately
^Charlie "I've seen some drugs exchange happening in the light of day...
^Charlie "I mean, trafficking has always happened, but now it just looks like they don't care about being seen
^This whole matter is weird to you, Spike being nastier than usual, people disappering, now this...
^You feel the urge to start to investigate more about it.

finishday1: ^Samantha gets up to leave, she seems in a rush
^Samantha "Just wanted to say hi, bye Charlie, bye Hiro
^You wave at her as she leaves the tavern. You realize it's actually gotten late with your chats
^Charlie drinks his last sip fo liquor, then he also gets up
^Charlie "I should go too, tomorrow is another day at work, hoping it would be better than today.
^He gets some change from his pocket and leaves it on the counter, then he leaves
^Your shift at the tavern is almost finished, and Spike and Olivia come in.
^You hope they didn't hear your conversation with Charlie and Samantha.
^They sit down and you greet them.
^You get a bit further away from them as you start washing dishes.
^They are chatting and flirting as always.
^But at some point, you notice that they are starting to argue.
^Spike is fuming, as he gets up, he smashes the chair on the ground, then follows Olivia outside.
^Four customers and only one drink... what a day...
^You think that Samantha was right, they are always arguing, and Olivia seems the abused one here.
^You decide to keep track of all the weird happening from now on
^It could be nothing... but your guts is telling you otherwise, something's off here
1_A: ^You have new clues about the whole matter, yesterday was quite a good progress in your research.
^You are ready to open the tavern, hoping to get even more info.
^You realize that you never saw Olivia after that time when they fought.
^The situation is strange, maybe Spike did something, this must be investigated.
^He looks like he hasn't slept in ages and he also seems pissed.

GoodSpike: ^You serve the usual drink Spike orders.

s: ^Heard you and Olivia are having some problems...

c-1: ^You "I've heard you and Olivia are having some problems.
c-2: ^You "Is Olivia ok? She hasn't come in a while...

2_A: ^Spike lowers his voice as he speaks the last words, something is wrong, "I think"? what does he mean?

c-0: ^Spike "Did I say that? I didn't mean it.
c-1: ^You "Oh that's good to hear, I was really worried, she didn't seem fine the other day.

2_B: ^Spike "We're fine, and it's none of your business anyway.
^Spike is visibly upset, why is he so defensive?

c-0: ^You "Sorry man, I'm just trying to help here.
c-1: ^You "Sorry, I'm just worried about her, she didn't seem fine the other day.

3_A: ^Spike "We had a small fight, everything is fine now...
^It seems like he's a bit more calm now.

s: ^It's weird that she hasn't come here

c-0: ^You "I'm just asking because it's weird that she hasn't been here in a while... maybe you know why.
c-1: ^You "Oh that's great! I thought you killed her ahahah...
c-2: ^You "That tone is not convincing at all you know...

3_B: ^He looks furious, like the other day with Olivia...
^All of a sudden you feel a void in your stomach.

s: ^The situation doesn't look good for you

c-0: ^You "Jeez man, chill down, you're overreacting, I'm just concerned about Olivia.
^Spike "Are you deaf or something? I just told you we're fine... she's fine...
^He doens't look angry anymore, more... sad
c-1: ^You "Look, the thing is, you two argued, she left, you followed her, then she disappeared, it doesn't look good for you.

4_A: ^Spike sips the last liquor left in the glass, it's difficult to understand his emotions...

s: ^You don't know what happened to Olivia?

c-0: ^You "So you know nothing about what happened to her after that night?
^Spike "Can you stop harrasing me with questions?
c-1: ^You "Do you want another drink? it's on the house.

c-0: ^You serve the drink again, you put a bit more liquor this time, maybe it'll help him open up.
^Spike empties the glass in one shot
c-1: ^You serve the drink again, you put a bit more liquor this time, maybe it'll help him open up.
^Spike empties the glass in one shot

Bad: ^Spike is still upset, he probably won't tell you anything today.
^He takes some coins from his pocket, leaves them on the counter.
^Then he gets up and goes away, without saying a word.
^You got nothing from this conversation, you feel down...
Good: ^Spike "I really don't know what happened to her you know...
^He seems like he's about to cry
^Spike "We got into that fight... stupid fight
^Spike "Then she left... I tried to chase her, I was upset, but I wanted to say sorry...
^Spike "When I went out she was already gone... and I haven't heard from her since...
^He starts to cry, his eyes are full with pain
^Spike "I can't think that she just left, something must've happened...
^Spike continues to cry over his glass...

c-0: ^You "I know I'm just a barista, but I will discover what happened to her and you'll get her back... I promise
^Spike "Thanks man... I'll tell you if I know something
^Spike gets up and leaves the tavern, you know he was sincere.
c-1: ^You "She probably just left you and doesn't want to see you again, I know you treated her wrong...
^Spike gets up and leaves, slamming the door after him.

EndDayThree: ^The night is quiet today, it looks like no one else is coming, which also adds to the whole situation.
^You are puzzled by the information you got in the last few days...
^You need time to think it through

DayTwo: ^It's a new evening at work, you spent the afternoon setting up a wall to keep clues in the back.
^You decided that you will use it to keep track of what you discover about the whole matter.
^You are still wondering about this whole situation. Crimes, weird behaviors, everything is weird.
^Who is behind all of this? And what's their motive?
^As you are lost in your thoughts, Vicky comes in.
^She sits at the counter, with her usual  mysterious attitude.
^Vicky "Hi Hiro, what are you up to these days?

c-0: ^You "Don't worry about me, what are YOU up to instead?"
c-1: ^You "I'm stealing your job it appears... trying to figure out some stuff.

questions: ^Vicky "Oh... always so mysterious Hiro, I'm the detective here, you stealing my job?
^Vicky "Nothing much by the way, some cases to solve as always...
^She's flirtatious as always... maybe you could use it to your advantage.
^Vicky is a private investigator, maybe she knows something.

s: ^"You are the mysterious one here Vicky, I always wanted to know more about you"

c-1: ^You "You are the mysterious one here Vicky, I always wanted to know more about you..."

detective: ^Vicky "Hm... that's interesting, I want to know more...

s: ^"You are the mysterious one here Vicky, I always wanted to know more about you"

c-0: ^You "Maybe we can exchange some info, you tell me something, I tell you something...
c-1: ^You "Let's not talk about me... You are the mysterious one here Vicky, I always wanted to know more about you..."

cases: ^Vicky "Oh Hiro dear, I wouldn't tell my secrets so carelessely
^As you talk someone enters the tavern
^They sit down at the table in the back.
^Vicky also raised her guard, she is a good detective after all...
flirt: ^Vicky "It's my job to be... especially nowadays, you know...
^As you talk someone enters the tavern
^They sit down at the table in the back.
^Vicky also raised her guard, she is a good detective after all...

GoodVicky: ^You serve the drink to Vicky, always keeping an eye to the shady figure in the back.
BadVicky: ^You serve the drink to Vicky, always keeping an eye out for the shady figure in the back.
^Vicky "Did you change the recipe? It's really horrible...

s: ^"A lot has happened in town lately... do you know something?
^"You are such a good investigator Vicky, for not opening up so easily"

c-0: ^You "A lot has happened in town lately... do you know something about it?"
c-1: ^You "You are such a good investigator Vicky, for not opening up so easily... so diligent

flatter: ^Vicky "You flatter me Hiro... you are a good barista. We make a nice team... you know.
^You smile at Vicky, she's always so charming....
NoInfo: ^Nothing... You feel disappointed, you coud've gotten something from her.
Info: ^Vicky "Well... there is something I can tell you actually...
^Vicky "Yesterday I was passing by Samantha's gym...
^Vicky tries to whisper as low as she can, getting closer to you.
^You feel her breath on your ear.
^Vicky "And I saw Charlie making a delivery... which might sound normal.
^Vicky "What's suspicious is that they were in the dark alley next to the gym...
^Vicky "and they were exchanging this package very secretely...
^What could this mean? That's such a weird behavior...
^Vicky moves away from your ear, you feel like this information might be important.
MaxIn: ^As you finish talking Max walks in
^He sits down at the counter next to Vicky
^Max "Hello people, such a nice evening isn't it?
^Max "Can't I be happy? Everything is going well, life is great, you both should try to smile more actually

c-1: ^Max "Oh boo hoo, you need to find happiness, it won't come by itself.
^Max "And about that, give me a drink please

GoodMax: ^He sips it lightly as he usually does.
BadMax: ^He sips it lightly as he usually does.
^Max "Disgusting... your sadness reflects in your drinks love...
accusation: ^As you are talking the person in the back gets up and leaves...
^You all turn around to watch them...
^You and Vicky shrug your shoulders in ignorance.
^Vicky "So why are you so happy Max? tell us the truth...
^Vicky "Things are happening in town, you must've noticed... how can you be so carefree, hm?
^You can see the detective coming out from Vicky... she really is good
^Max appears tense all of a sudden.
^Max "Wh-what do you mean? Of course I know about the crimes...
^Max "I'm just happy because my fashion business is going great these past few days... I think it's right to be satisfied by that.
^That's weird, everyone is having trouble at work and Max seems to be the only one with good results...
^You can see in Vicky's face that she thinks the same thing, she must know a lot of the things you also know.
^Max gets up and leaves, after paying you for the drink
^You and Vicky share a look of agreement, no words are needed.
^She also gets up, gives you a tip and leaves
^Maybe she went to follow him in the shadows, to discover more... who knows.
^The situation here gets more cryptic by the day...
^You close the tavern, it's gotten late.
